Data: Paragraf|My name is Frengky Sinaga, and I'm a back-end developer (with a little bit of front-end) who uses Visual Studio as an IDE and uses C# as the programming language for ASP.NET WebForm and MVC.
Paragraf|Would you want to try this "desktop" and see what I'm capable of (at least for the front-end)?
Paragraf|There are lots of website portfolios out there, and all of them looked the same. I wanted my website to look different, and since I already use Windows, why not use it as inspiration?
